council.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice
council.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the organization that is responsible for local government in a particular area in Britain
council.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He sent a letter to the council to complain about the noise.
council.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a group of people elected to the government of a city in the US

Brzezinski headed the National Security Council at that time.

She had to attend a council meeting.
School council members are elected by their fellow students.
Council resolutions need a two thirds majority.

council.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a group of people that are chosen to make rules, laws, or decisions, or to give advice
council.translation[1].definitions[1].de: in Britain, the organization that is responsible for local government in a particular region
council.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Bob Jones has been on the Borough Council for years.
